theme.name: CrystalX
theme.author: vit.dlouhy
theme.description: 2-column, right side navigation bar; horizontal nav; blue header with white body. Orignally from Open Source Web Design (http://www.oswd.org/design/information/id/3465/). Adapted for PryoCMS by Gordon Oppenheimer. There is no code behind the search bar or the RSS feed at this point.
